types.name: BatteryState
types.description: Represents the state of the battery.

properties.name: charging
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether the battery is currently being charged.

properties.name: chargingTime
properties.description: A number representing the remaining time in seconds until the battery is fully charged, or 0 if the battery is already fully charged.

properties.name: dischargingTime
properties.description: A number representing the remaining time in seconds until the battery is completely discharged and the system will suspend.

properties.name: level
properties.description: A number representing the system's battery charge level scaled to a value between 0.0 and 1.0.
